description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Sumba, Indonesia. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Indonesia Eco-Luxury Sumba Island Boutique Beachfront Retreat
hotels.description: Absolute serenity, natural elegance, and island eco-luxury are the foundations of Indonesia’s boutique Cap Karoso - perched on the unspoilt western shores of Sumba Island. Discover the island's culture and villages on a Sumba tour and surf the world-renowned breaks. Julang restaurant, run by guest chefs, serves French-inspired fine dining, while the Beach Club offers a laidback approach to seaside eating with casual Mediterranean-meets-Indonesian ingredients.

hotels.title: Indonesia Sumba Island Beachfront Hideaway with Shoreside Bar, Infinity Pools and World-Class Surfing
hotels.description: Escape to the largely untouched island of Sumba and discover The Sanubari - pure coastal luxury blended with stunning natural beauty and contemporary touches Boasting incredible views of the pristine white sand beach and lush surrounds, relax and take the view in from the infinity pool or with a cocktail in hand at the beachfront bar. Ideal for surfing enthusiasts, the beach is world-class and uncrowded, and the Sumbanese swimming horses are amazing at sunset.
